document_data.caption: A Griffon Cavalry rider (right) next to other members of the City Guard.
document_data.name: Griffon Cavalry Rider
document_data.mainbody: A '''Griffon Cavalry rider''' was a member of the [[Griffon Cavalry]] branch of the [[City Guard (Waterdeep)|City Guard]] of [[Waterdeep]].

Activities.Training: Griffon Cavalry riders and their mounts were stationed atop [[Peaktop Aerie]], where civilians were not welcome. It was also there that [[griffon]]s were trained as mounts. A moderate knowledge of animal handling was usually required to mount and ride a griffon.

document_data.Possessions: By the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], Griffon Cavalry riders were generally equipped with a [[lance]], [[dagger]], [[light crossbow]], [[half plate armor]], and a unique consumable [[magic]] ring, which allowed the wearer to cast ''[[feather fall]]'' once if knocked from the mount mid-flight, becoming non-magical afterwards.
